verbose_text: The pro apoptotic member Bax translocates to the mitochondrion and integrates into the OMM, where Bax promotes the excretion of cytochrome c into the cytosol and the disruption of DeltaPsim, whereas anti-apoptotic protein Bcl-2 prevents this process by preserving mitochondrial integrity.
evidence: Bax promotes the excretion of cytochrome c
